properties.name: mybatis.configuration-properties.close-local-cache
properties.description: 是否关闭mybatis自带的一级缓存，默认是false

properties.name: mybatis.configuration-properties.default-batch-executor-type
properties.description: 默认的批处理执行器，默认为BATCH-REUSE

properties.name: mybatis.configuration-properties.logging.log-full-sql
properties.description: 是否额外打印完整的sql日志，默认为false

properties.name: mybatis.configuration-properties.logging.format-full-sql
properties.description: 是否打印额外的完整的sql日志，默认为false

properties.name: mybatis.configuration-properties.hot-deploy.enable
properties.description: 是否开启xml文件热部署，默认为false
